page.title: 01OUTLINE-STURTON & DISTRICT
page.content: THE BUSY,ACTIVE,WORKING VILLAGE OF {STURTON BY STOW}AND ITS SURROUNDING HAMLETS OF{BRANSBY,INGLEBY,THORPE LE {FALLOWS AND BROXHOLME}IS ON A FLAT MAINLY AGRICULTURAL LANDSCAPE. IT IS SITED ON THE CROSSROADS FORMED BY THE{LINCOLN TO GAINSBOROUGH ROAD}AND THE{ROMAN ROAD}KNOWN AS{TILLBRIDGE {LANE.}THE VILLAGE IS EQUIDISTANT FROM THE CITY OF{LINCOLN}AND THE MARKET TOWN OF{GAINSBOROUGH}BOTH 8.5 MILES AWAY. THE WHOLE AREA IS DRAINED BY THE RIVERS{TILL}AND THE SMALLER{CRICKET {TILL,}SURPLUS WATER FROM THE LOWER LYING SOUTH FIELDS NEEDING TO BE PUMPED INTO THE RIVERS. MOST PEOPLE LIVE IN STURTON,THE REST OF THE AREA BEING ONLY THINLY POPULATED. THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE COMMUTE TO THEIR PLACES OF EMPLOYMENT.THE SECONDARY AND PRIMARY SCHOOLS ARE SITED IN THE VILLAGE.
